item.title: How do you make a starter comand work only once
item.dc:creator: @Thedup Thedup
item.description:
@Thedup wrote:

[quote=“pinkman1o222, post:3, topic:157646”]umm maybe try this

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(ITEMID, AMMOUNT);
addItem(ITEMID, AMMOUNT);
sendMessage(“MESSAGEHERE”);
starter = 1;
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“You have already received your starter pack !”);
}
}code]

hope this helped

EDIT:darn thedup beat me :([/code][/quote]
Sorry. :S

item.title: How do you make a starter comand work only once
item.dc:creator: @Thedup Thedup
item.description:
@Thedup wrote:

This is my Starter code.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 1000000); sendMessage("The starter packet for Claude's Isle Players !"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !"); } }

Hehe.

here is what my command looks like:

if (command.startsWith(“mystarter”))
{
addItem(1048, 1);
addItem(1052, 1);
addItem(6585, 1);
addItem(995, 1000000);
addItem(392, 1000);
addItem(4714, 1);
addItem(4712, 1);
addItem(4131, 1);
addItem(1187, 1);
addItem(2491, 1);
